entries.name: Alondite
entries.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

entries.name: Amiti
entries.description: Inflicts Spd-2. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice.

entries.name: Ardent Durandal
entries.description: Grants Atk+3. At start of turn, grants 【Bonus Doubler】to ally with the highest Atk. 【Bonus Doubler】 Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = current bonus on each of unit's stats for 1 turn. Calculates each stat bonus independently.

entries.name: Armorslayer+
entries.description: Effective against armored foes.

entries.name: Armorslayer
entries.description: Effective against armored foes.

entries.name: Armorsmasher+
entries.description: Effective against armored foes.

entries.name: Armorsmasher
entries.description: Effective against armored foes.

entries.name: Astra Blade
entries.description: Grants Atk+3. If unit's Atk > foe's Def, deals damage = 50% of unit's Atk minus foe's Def.

entries.name: Audhulma
entries.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). Grants Res+5.

entries.name: Ayra's Blade
entries.description: Grants Spd+3. If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Barrier Blade+
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+7 during combat.

entries.name: Barrier Blade
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Res+7 during combat .

entries.name: Bellringer+
entries.description: When unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores 5 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

entries.name: Bellringer
entries.description: When unit deals damage to foe during combat, restores 5 HP to unit. (Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

entries.name: Beloved Zofia
entries.description: Grants Def+3. At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 4 damage to unit.

entries.name: Binding Blade
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+2 during combat.

entries.name: Blazing Durandal
entries.description: Grants Atk+3. If unit's Atk > foe's Atk, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Brave Sword+
entries.description: Inflicts Spd-5. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice.

entries.name: Brave Sword
entries.description: Inflicts Spd-5. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice.

entries.name: Bull Blade
entries.description: During combat, boosts unit's Atk/Def by number of allies within 2 spaces × 2. (Maximum bonus of +6 to each stat.)

entries.name: Cake Cutter+
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

entries.name: Cake Cutter
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

entries.name: Concealed Blade
entries.description: Deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

entries.name: Conjurer Curios
entries.description: Effective against armored foes. Grants Atk+3. If it is an odd-numbered turn or if foe's HP < 100% at start of combat, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat.

entries.name: Creator Sword
entries.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). During combat, neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks, prevent unit's follow-up attacks, grant "Special cooldown charge +X" to foe, or inflict "Special cooldown charge -X" on unit.

entries.name: Dark Greatsword
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat.

entries.name: Dark Mystletainn
entries.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). If Special triggers before or during combat, grants Special cooldown count-2 after combat.

entries.name: Divine Tyrfing
entries.description: Grants Res+3. Reduces damage from magic foe's first attack by 50%.

entries.name: Dracofalchion
entries.description: Effective against dragon foes. Grants Atk+3. If the number of foes within 2 spaces (excluding target) ≥ the number of allies within 2 spaces (excluding unit), grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 during combat.

entries.name: Dragonbind
entries.description: Effective against dragon foes. Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

entries.name: Durandal
entries.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+4 during combat.

entries.name: Eckesachs
entries.description: At start of turn, inflicts Def-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

entries.name: Exalted Falchion
entries.description: Effective against dragon foes. Grants Spd+3. Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = current bonus on each of unit's stats. Calculates each stat bonus independently.

entries.name: Falchion
entries.description: Effective against dragon foes. At the start of every third turn, restores 10 HP.

entries.name: Firesweep S+
entries.description: Unit and foe cannot counterattack.

entries.name: Firesweep S
entries.description: Unit and foe cannot counterattack.

entries.name: Fólkvangr
entries.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Atk+5 for 1 turn.

entries.name: Geishun+
entries.description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk through its next action.

entries.name: Geishun
entries.description: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk through its next action.

entries.name: Gjöll
entries.description: Grants Atk+3. If a penalty inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and/or a negative status effect (preventing counterattacks or restricting movement) is active on foe, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot.

entries.name: Gladiator's Blade
entries.description: If unit’s Atk > foe’s Atk, grants Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Golden Dagger
entries.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).

entries.name: Guard Sword+
entries.description: Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Guard Sword
entries.description: Inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Hana's Katana
entries.description: Effective against armored foes.

entries.name: Heart's Blade+
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

entries.name: Heart's Blade
entries.description: If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

entries.name: Hikami
entries.description: Grants Spd+3. At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on nearest foes within 4 spaces through their next actions.

entries.name: Hinata's Katana
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat.

entries.name: Kadomatsu+
entries.description: Grants Def/Res+2 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

entries.name: Kadomatsu
entries.description: Grants Def/Res+2 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

entries.name: Killing Edge+
entries.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).

entries.name: Killing Edge
entries.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).

entries.name: Laevatein
entries.description: Grants Atk+3. Grants bonus to unit’s Atk = total bonuses on unit during combat.

entries.name: Light Brand
entries.description: Grants Def+3. If foe's Def ≥ foe's Res+5, deals +7 damage.

entries.name: Mareeta's Sword
entries.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 and neutralizes effects that guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects that prevent unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

entries.name: Meisterschwert
entries.description: Inflicts Spd-5. Unit attacks twice. (Even if foe initiates combat, unit attacks twice.)

entries.name: Mercurius
entries.description: Grants Atk+3. At start of turn, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit and sword, lance, axe, bow, dagger, or beast allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. (Bonus granted to unit even if no allies are within 2 spaces.)

entries.name: Missiletainn
entries.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). Grants Special cooldown charge +1 per foe's attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack. Special cooldown charge granted even if foe's attack deals 0 damage.)

entries.name: Mystletainn
entries.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).

entries.name: Nameless Blade
entries.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).

entries.name: Níu
entries.description: Grants Spd+3. Adds 50% of total bonuses on foe to unit's Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat.

entries.name: Panther Sword
entries.description: If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 20%.

entries.name: Petal Parasol+
entries.description: If【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat. 【Penalty】 All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

entries.name: Petal Parasol
entries.description: If【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Atk/Spd+5 during combat. 【Penalty】 All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).

entries.name: Ragnell
entries.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

entries.name: Ragnell·Alondite
entries.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. Inflicts Spd-5. Unit attacks twice (even if foe initiates combat).

entries.name: Raijinto
entries.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

entries.name: Rapier
entries.description: Effective against armored and cavalry foes. Grants Spd+3. If unit’s HP ≤ 75% and foe initiates combat, unit can counterattack before foe's first attack.

entries.name: Regal Blade
entries.description: At start of combat, if foe’s HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd+2 during combat.

entries.name: Resolute Blade
entries.description: Grants Atk+3. Deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

entries.name: Rowdy Sword
entries.description: Inflicts Spd-5. If unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice.

entries.name: Royal Sword
entries.description: Grants Spd+3. If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, grants unit Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Ruby Sword+
entries.description: If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 20%.

entries.name: Ruby Sword
entries.description: If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 20%.

entries.name: Safeguard+
entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+7 during combat.

entries.description: If foe initiates combat, grants Def+7 during combat.

entries.name: Sandfort Spade+
entries.description: If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone is active on unit, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat.

entries.description: If a bonus granted by a skill like Rally or Hone is active on unit, grants Atk/Def+4 during combat.

entries.name: Scarlet Sword
entries.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).

entries.name: Sealed Falchion
entries.description: Effective against dragon foes. At start of combat, if unit's HP < 100%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 during combat.

entries.name: Selena's Blade
entries.description: Effective against armored foes. At start of combat, if foe's Atk ≥ unit's Atk +3, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 during combat.

entries.name: Shadow Sword
entries.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). If unit's HP ≥ 50% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack .

entries.name: Siegfried
entries.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.

entries.name: Sieglinde
entries.description: At start of turn, grants Atk+3 to adjacent allies for 1 turn.

entries.name: Silverbrand
entries.description: If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 20%.

entries.name: Skuld
entries.description: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 to target.

entries.name: Slaying Edge+
entries.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).

entries.name: Slaying Edge
entries.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).

entries.name: Sökkvabekkr
entries.description: If unit is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat, and unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, but after combat, if unit attacked, deals 20 damage to nearest ally.

entries.name: Sol Katti
entries.description: If unit's HP ≤ 50% and unit initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counterattack.

entries.name: Solitary Blade
entries.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).

entries.name: Storm Sieglinde
entries.description: Grants Atk+3. If the number of foes within 2 spaces (excluding target) ≥ the number of allies within 2 spaces (excluding unit), grants Def/Res+3 and Special cooldown charge +1 per unit's attack during combat. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

entries.name: Tyrfing
entries.description: If unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Def+4 during combat.

entries.name: Umbra Burst
entries.description: Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range. Deals a minimum of 1 damage.

entries.name: Vassal's Blade
entries.description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, deals damage = 70% of difference between stats. (Maximum bonus of +7 damage. Combos with Phantom Spd.)

entries.name: Venin Edge
entries.description: Grants Def+3. After combat, if unit attacked, deals 10 damage to target and foes within 2 spaces of target, and inflicts status on those foes preventing counterattacks through their next actions.

entries.name: Whitewing Blade
entries.description: If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 20%.
